code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./images-about.css";import pic1 from"../assets/picsForSite/pic1.JPG";import pic2 from"../assets/picsForSite/pic2.png";import pic3 from"../assets/picsForSite/pic3.JPG";import butterfly from"../assets/butterfly.png";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const SliderData=[{image:pic1},{image:pic2},{image:pic3}];export const ImageSlider=_ref=>{let{slides}=_ref;const[current,setCurrent]=useState(0);const length=slides.length;const nextSlide=()=>{setCurrent(current===length-1?0:current+1);};const prevSlide=()=>{setCurrent(current===0?length-1:current-1);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"slider",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"arrow-left",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-arrow-left",onClick:prevSlide})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"arrow-right",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bi bi-arrow-right ps-5",onClick:nextSlide})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:butterfly,alt:"",className:"butterfly"}),slides.map((slide,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:index===current?"slide active":"slide",children:index===current&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:slide.image,alt:`Slide ${index+1}`,className:"image"})},index))]});};
